holidays.title: April Showers Day
holidays.description: May flowers bloom after April showers, so get out in your garden and start planting.

holidays.title: Earth Day
holidays.description: Cue the composting, recycling, repurposing, carpooling, thrifting, and metal straws to save the turtles.

holidays.title: Girl Scout Leader Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Girl Scout Leader Appreciation Day by raising a toast to these amazing leaders.

holidays.title: Global Selfie Earth Day
holidays.description: Get yourself at the perfect spot to take a selfie on this Global Selfie Earth Day!

holidays.title: In God We Trust Day
holidays.description: In the true American spirit, let’s embrace the term ‘In God We Trust.’

holidays.title: International Mother Earth Day
holidays.description: It is our responsibility as Earth's residents to protect her as best we can.

holidays.title: National I.T. Service Provider Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate all I.T. professionals and their invaluable contributions.

holidays.title: National Jelly Bean Day
holidays.description: Your dentist never has to know.

holidays.title: National Pinup Day
holidays.description: Step out in your best vintage and retro clothes to celebrate this day.

holidays.title: National Terry Day
holidays.description: Come along with us as we celebrate all the individuals with the unique name Terry.

holidays.title: Oklahoma Day
holidays.description: Because it's Oklahoma Day, Oakies everywhere are raising their fists high! Let's celebrate with them.

holidays.title: Secretary Day
holidays.description: This Secretary Day, show secretaries how much you value their hard work.

holidays.title: Stephen Lawrence Day
holidays.description: Racism should not exist. In honor of Stephen Lawrence, we commemorate this day to eradicate racial prejudice.

holidays.title: Callum Snape’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this traveling photographer, the world is his oyster and he is ready to explore!

holidays.title: emo.fio’s Birthday
holidays.description: A famous TikToker who at a young age already has over one million followers.

holidays.title: Jack Nicholson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Five decades of fascinating screen time with this Hollywood legend will never be forgotten.

holidays.title: Machine Gun Kelly’s Birthday
holidays.description: Machine Gun Kelly is an exceptionally talented, award-winning rapper, actor, and musician from America.

holidays.title: Selah Victor’s Birthday
holidays.description: This voice-over actress is a phenomenal talent and one of Hollywood's brightest stars.

holidays.title: Vladimir Lenin’s Birthday
holidays.description: Known as one of history's greatest revolutionary leaders, has left an indelible mark on humanity.
